newsitem.title: USA: Host Marriott gets stake in Hartford hotel.
newsitem.headline: Host Marriott gets stake in Hartford hotel.

text.p: Host Marriott Corp said Tuesday that it had acquired a 51 percent interest in a newly formed partnership that owns the Hartford Marriott Farmington, a 380-room hotel near Hartford, Connecticut.
Host Marriott said it acquired the stake for about $4.1 million, adding that the partnership has $22 million of fixed rate first mortgage debt on the property.
The hotel is expected to report about $4.2 million of Earnings Before Interest Expense, Taxes, Depreciation, Amortization and other non-cash items for 1997, Host Marriott said.
Host Marriott said the deal gives it completed acquisitions with a total value of nearly $1 billion and that it is optimistic about its ability to achieve its goal of $1.3 billion.
